titleStmt.title: Seasonable advice to youth A funeral sermon on Psal. 119. 9. Preach'd upon the death of Mr. Richard Walter, jun. In the eighteenth year of his age. January 13th, 1691/2. By John Shower.
titleStmt.author: Shower, John, 1657-1715.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for Samuel Crouch, at the corner of Pope's-Head-Alley, over against the Royal-Exchange,

notesStmt.note: Caption title on p. 1: A funeral sermon on the death of Mr. Richard Walter.
Copy closely trimmed at foot with slight loss of print.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library, Oxford.

place.placeName: the corner of Pope's-Head-Alley, over against the Royal-Exchange
